name: Axon
description: A TensorFlow-backed web app for retraining COCO trained Mobilenets for use in the FIRST Robotics Competition.

name: Accurate Centroid-Determining Human Body Detection
description: A triple neural network project for detecting the centroid of human body in depth images. Used a sparse auto-encoder, a convolutional neural network, sliding window localization, and a Haar cascade classifier to accomplish this task.
